title: Bloomberg Markets: Perkins on Mixed Bag for Retailers
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Perkins on Mixed Bag for Retailers
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ken Perkins President Retail Metrics Discussing second quarter retail earnings parade continued this morning with mixed results coming in from the likes of Home Depot (HD), Dick’s Sporting Goods (DKS), Advanced Auto Parts (AAP), TJX (TJX), and Coach (COH).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
